hayitiye eksath jathinge sama sadhaka hamudawata bandi siti shri lanka yuda sebalun 114 denaku dariwiyan athulu kanthawanta erehiwa lingika aparadha kirime chodana walata 2007 nowambarayedi aapasu harawa yawana ladi.ee sambandhayen wagakiwa yuththanta aparadha nithiya yatathe danduwam pamunuwana lesath, anagatha sama sadhaka meheyum sandaha yawimata pera ana dena niladharin athulu bhata sena purwa sodisiyakata lak karana lesath jiniwa nuwara raswu wadhahinsawata erehi eksath jathinge kamituwa wisin nirdesha kara thibe.idiriyedi ewani aparadha sidu nowanu pinisa shri lanka yuda hamudawata lingika apachara walakwima pilibanda wishesha puhunuwak laba dena lesada kamituwa illa atha.wisheshagnya danuma :thaman balayata path wana wita jathyanthara hamuda kshethrayen prathikshepa kara thibu sahaya shri lankawe hamudawa wetha nawatha laba ganima abhiyogayak bawa upadhi pradanothsawaya amathamin makoladi awadharanaya kala janadhipathiwaraya shri lanka yuda hamudawa sathuwa nomathi wisheshagnya danuma ha puhunuwa sandaha jathyanthara honda hitha athyawashya bawa penwa dunneya.jathyanthara kshethrayen shri lankawe aarakshaka ansha wisin laba gatha yuthu sahaya lesin, danuma saha sampath wardhanaya kara ganima, yuda shilpiya danuma wardhanaya karaganima, puhunu ha paryeshana ansha shakthimath kirima, thakshana danuma, yuda shilpiya danuma ha wisheshagnya danuma laba ganima yanadi ansha janadhipathiwaraya wisin handunwa dena ladi.waradi arthakathana : ikuth mahinda rajapaksha palana samaye nathiwi giya jathyanthara sahayogaya nawatha dina ganimata thaman ganna wiriya pilibandawa athamun pilibanda waradi arthakathana dena bawata janadhipathiwarayage wiwechanayata lak wiya.
anika thamayi unge samanya danima.

janamadhya nidahasa shapatha karamin balayata aa yahapalana aanduwakin lanka ee niws waranaya kirima kisiseth balaporoththu nowannaki: janapathi, agamathi, madhya amathi hethu kiwa yuthuyi - shri lanka wruththiya janamadhyawedinge sangamaya (lanka ee niws -2017.nowa.09, pa.wa.1.30) lanka ee niws shri lankawa thula waranaya kirimata madhya nidahasa sapatha karamin balayata pamini yahapalana aanduwa wisin gath piyawara janathawa saha madhya samajaya kisiseth balaporoththu nowannak bawath waranaya waha iwath karana lesath me sambandhayen siya mathaya prakasha karana lesa janadhipathigen, agamathigen, janamadhya amathigen saha telikom bara amathiwarayagen illa sitina bawath shri lanka wruththiya madhyawedinge sangamaya niwedanayak nikuth karamin pawasayi.
